about_the_game: This is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a field (and a school, and a comically large grocery store...). This thing needs to be studied in a lab, we don't know how it can bounce, stretch out and then jump again in midair. Also, you can roll around or something. Discover what those funny looking block things do, what those other funny block things do, and what those transparent funny block things do in Project Colored Mountains.

highlighted.name: The Real Project Colored Mountains Was the Friends We Made Along the Way

detailed_description: This is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a field (and a school, and a comically large grocery store...). This thing needs to be studied in a lab, we don't know how it can bounce, stretch out and then jump again in midair. Also, you can roll around or something. Discover what those funny looking block things do, what those other funny block things do, and what those transparent funny block things do in Project Colored Mountains.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ or similar Debian-based distro; SteamOS 3 or similar Arch or Arch-based distro
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3000 series or later, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or later, or equivalent; requires Vulkan support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ or similar Debian-based distro; SteamOS 3 or similar Arch or Arch-based distro
  • Processor: Ryzen 5/7 3000 series or later, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or later, or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Have 5-7 GB of free storage space available if purchasing in Early Access, as the game's file size will grow significantly

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (8th generation) or M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Project Colored Mountains has only been tested on Apple Silicon processors, Intel ones may not work.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11+
  • Processor: Any M-series chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Have 7-9 GB of free space if purchasing in Early Access, as the game's file size will grow significantly

short_description: Project Colored Mountains is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a town (and a school, and a comically large store...). Jump around aimlessly and defy the laws of physics in fun little areas like Generic High School and Field.
